name: Healthyfied Adobong Sitaw
description: This Healthyfied Adobong Sitaw recipe is perfect for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. Enjoy a healthier twist on the traditional Filipino dish, keeping the flavors you love with a nutritionally balanced approach. It is ideal for anyone looking to maintain a healthy lifestyle without compromising on taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Raw Sitaw under cold water and trim the ends.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet over medium heat, saut√© the diced Red Onion until soft and translucent, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the Raw Sitaw to the skillet and cook, stirring occasionally, until it starts to soften, about 8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the Coconut Amino, stir well to combine, and continue to cook for another 7 minutes or until the Sitaw is fully cooked but still retains some crunch.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from heat and serve immediately. Enjoy your healthy and flavorful Adobong Sitaw!
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
